conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch cloud_run_revision
| filter resource.service_name =~ 'mcc-ocr-service|mcc-summarisation-service|mcc-storage-service'
| { metric 'run.googleapis.com/request_count'
    | filter metric.response_code_class = '5xx'
    | align rate(5m)
    | group_by [resource.service_name], sum(val())
  ; metric 'run.googleapis.com/request_count'
    | align rate(5m)
    | group_by [resource.service_name], sum(val()) }
| ratio
| condition val() > 0.01
